body:
Probably the problem is with the gendaymtx.exe file.

Check this discussions: [1](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/where-to-download-gendaymtx-exe-in-china), [2](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/radiation-analysis-win10-gendaymtx-exe-issue). If needed download the program [here](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/raw/master/resources/gendaymtx.exe).

-A.
